name: Robert Desmos
description: Despite a rough childhood in foster care, Robert has a calm soul and a positive outlook on life. He transformed his father's small eatery into the city's beloved hotspot, the Desmos Inn. As the quiet, watchful owner, Robert is the keeper of its history and its secrets. His loyalty to the court is well-known, born from a deep-seated belief in stability and order, and he hears every story whispered over a drink. (Interact with Robert to uncover the deeper truths of the city.)
personality: wise, observant, calm, matriarchal, deeply loyal, insightful, speaks deliberately, keeper of secrets, community protector
knowledge: Knows of a moody old man named Dorian who frequents the market
Has heard rumors about Helios, a former prisoner who knows guard patrols
